posts.raw_content:
And why are we sending nuclear submarines to Russia and doing stuff like Trump's "shock and awe" sanctions. Biden already tried that.

Seems like Trump is getting bad info here.

posts.raw_content:
Ratcliffe revealed that he and FBI Director Kash Patel "will be declassifying additional documents that showed just how sinister the FBI was in amplifying Hillary Clinton's Steele dossier as real and credible to be included in the intelligence community assessment."

"There will be more to come," he vowed. "And I think that people should expect that the Trump administration will continue to shed transparency, and light, and truth."

"There is no question: This was the greatest political scandal of our lifetime," he added, calling it a "stain on our country that should never happen again."

posts.title: Oklahoma #middleout

twitter.content: Oklahoma is the first state requiring an "America First" certification test for teachers moving from blue states like California and New York.  They must pass exams on U.S. history, civics, the Constitution, and basic biology to align with values of truth and responsibility.
